Text:
Thanks! And for those that don't know, here's a link for the direct download:
http://modlife.com/angelsandairwaves/love
Don't go to Raeesd's link, it's just a link to AVA's homepage....
That link used to go to a direct download, as Tom DeLonge released the album for free. However it now just redirects to the Angels & Airwaves website.
